title: sender email
desc: set the email address of the sender

title: receiver email doctorsnote cc
desc: comma separated email addresses of receivers in cc, e.g. klassenlehrer@kkos.net,jane@school.com

title: receiver email doctorsnote
desc: comma separated email addresses of receivers, e.g. krankmeldung@kkos.net,jane@school.com

title: receiver email lunch
desc: comma separated email addresses of receivers for the lunch cancelling email

title: smtp server
desc: specify your smtp server, e.g. smtp.ionos.de if you using ionos

title: port
desc: specify port for your smtp server, usually 587 or 465

title: child's name
desc: the name of the kid you are sending the note for

title: grade and class
desc: the name of the kids class, e.g. 8.4

title: show startup screen
desc: 0 to switch it on and 1 to switch it off
